sections.title: Introduction (Wide Shot)
sections.content: Hey everyone! Welcome back to the channel. Today, I'm going to show you a quick and easy way to generate Ethereum keypairs and derive public keys from mnemonic phrases using Python. Let's dive right in!

Please enter your seed phrase: your-seed-phrase-here

sections.content: Let's take a look at the output. You should see your Ethereum address and private key displayed in the terminal.

sections.content: And that's it! You've generated an Ethereum keypair and derived a public key. If you found this helpful, smash that like button and subscribe for more quick tutorials. Got questions? Drop them in the comments below. Thanks for watching!
